string.name: name
string.value: How Well Do You Know Your Skills?
Get some information on skills from #b#p1102006##k.

#p1102006# informed you that you can open your Skill window by pressing the #bK key#k and suggested that you hunt #r3 #o100121#s#k and bring #b1 #t4000483##k to prove that you know how to use your skills.
You've come back after hunting the #o0100121#s and brought back a #o0100121#'s feather. #p1102006# says #p1102007# is waiting for you. Proceed to the left.

You've defeated the #o0100121# and brought me the #o0100121# Feather. I'm impressed! I'm going to assume that you've completely understood and processed how to use the skill now. Let's go on to the next stage then.
You either have not yet defeated 3 #o0100121#s, or you haven't acquired the #o0100121# Feather. You'll be able to accomplish your mission if you just keep hunting the #o0100121#s.
You either have not yet defeated 3 #o0100121#s, or you haven't acquired the #o0100121# Feather. You'll be able to accomplish your mission if you just keep hunting the #o0100121#s.
